title: Guess the champ.
body:
Here's a whole bunch of things that describe a character, which character am I describing.
Purple
Bigger than a human
Sharp fangs
Insect-like legs
Huge "arms"
Incredibly tough carapace
Subterranean
Q is a small aoe ability
Has a weak skillshot as their only ranged source of damage
has a way to "see" over walls
Is partially known for things that are on map
those things have icons on the minimap
and are affected when enemies step on them
has a strong attack speed steroid
Lives in the shuriman desert in the lore
Is a specific and notable member of a race
can't interact well with humans

EDIT: Answer has been found. the answer is that this is actually the similarities between skarner and rek'sai.
so the answer is both of them.
The are really super similar at the core of it.
~~infact I'm pretty sure rek'sai was just riots attempt at remaking skarner without the ult~~

replies.body: All I can think of is {{champion:69}} ...
